page.title: 04Farms,Upper Otter:General
page.content: Farms are not large.In the 9 square kilometers of the valley there are some 27 of them,mostly worked by the farmer and his family. Up on the high ground,though,they are larger and run on more sophisticated and up-to-date lines. Some of the buildings marked on the O.S.map with their old farm-names are in fact no longer working farms and the surrounding fields no longer belong to them.The house and barns have been converted into much sought-after country homes for people whose work lies elsewhere. Mostly,however,the farms are in the hands of families who have worked in the valley for several generations.
